website_summaries.verdict: A practical yet elegant polyurethane leather cushion that protects your legs from a hot seat.
pros: This cover is crafted from polyurethane leather for a premium look and feel
Helps mitigate the effects of hot sun on car seat
Simple, 1-piece design makes it compatible with virtually every vehicle, even those with armrests and side airbags
cons: Depending on the fit of your seat, the cover may slip and require regular adjustment

customer_reviews.title: If you have "catch your ass on fire" leather seats in your car like me, this is a great seat cushion/cover
customer_reviews.text: If you have "catch your ass on fire" leather seats in your car like me, this is a great seat cushion/cover. It's comfy, it doesn't slide around, it doesn't make your butt sweat, and most importantly it doesn't catch your ass on fire when you sit down in your car after it's been sitting in 95 degree heat all day.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Camper

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 2018 Subaru Outback...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2018 Subaru Outback. Fit and color was excellent the cover was secured front to back using the attached elastic chords routed under the car seat. I can tell already how much of the wear and tear the seat cover has absorbed. Note: there is a granular like substance that makes up the padding and support, at the beginning a bit firm but breaks in.
customer_reviews.author: The H-Man

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a bottom set of seats for my 2016 Sonata. The beige/tan color is almost a perfect match. Very impressed with the fit and finish of theses seat covers. They are comfortable and the the little pocket in front is a nice touch. There are two hook straps in the front. A long strap that goes under and across the bottom and two rear straps that tuck between the seat and backrest and secure themselves underneath. In my case I secured them to straps that were under there. Requires a bit of effort to get underneath your seat from the rear but not a biggy. Took about 10 minutes or so to install them.
customer_reviews.author: GDB

customer_reviews.title: Still happy after 18 months.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cushion for over a year and a half. It has done exactly what I wanted, which was cover torn spots in the leather. I have mine a Honda Pilot and fit is great. Being on leather seats it did slide a little even when new. This was not a significant problem though. As with anything elastic, especially in hot southern sun, the strength of the elastic has started to weaken. This has caused more slippage and it is probably time to replace it. I will be purchasing another one of these soon.
customer_reviews.author: DR B

customer_reviews.title: 2004-2008 Acura TSX tan interior- almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect until one of clip broke. Nothing a huge paperclip can't fix. The back clip should have at least an adjustment or adjustable. Having this option, the cover would fit snugly.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon

customer_reviews.title: There is also pouches to put additional items which I love. GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I have a Lexus with beige interior and was looking for a seat cover that would match. It matched perfectly and the hooks at the bottom allow it to stay in place well, even when exiting and entering the car numerous times. There is also pouches to put additional items which I love. GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Xtina

customer_reviews.title: Edealyn New Universal Ultrathin Antiskid Car Seat:  Purchased at Amazon.com
customer_reviews.text: A pretty good product, good looking and covers the seat quite well. Unfortunately, in my type of car, the straps that would slide through the back of the seat just won't work. There is an immovable flap on the back of the seat, these straps can go around it, but they need to go right through it. To compensate, I slid the straps down the seat as far as they would go, and attached the hooks under the seat. So far the seat has moved very little, if at all. Nice to have adequate protection without having to stand on your head while struggling to cover the entire seat.
customer_reviews.author: dep

customer_reviews.title: Not a perfect fit for Tesla X seats.  Workable for front row.
customer_reviews.text: First impressions review. Product took 2 weeks+ to get to me. Packaging could’ve been better (black garbage bag-like packaging), but product was not damaged. Nice materials - a soft leather feel matching the Tesla seat material. Now if only it was in that bright white color to match. I got the beige color, which doesn't clash too much. Fit: a bit large for Tesla X row 2 and 3. It would also block the seatbelt as it’s in the seat itself. So not safe or practical. I’m now using for front row seats. Still a little large by 1/2 inch all around. Will keep anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Tim C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, Lexus RX330
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. The fit on my Lexus RX330 is perfect. The material and construction are very good. The color match is a little off but it is plenty close for a generic cover. I agree with other reviewers that it would be better if the straps were adjustable rather than just elastic. I'm sure I can make a work-around if over time the straps loosen and allow the cover to move. Regardless, for the price the product is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for Mercedes GLC300
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my driver's seat. I have a Mercedes GLC300 SUV. The color isn't a perfect match but it's pretty darn close, you can't even really tell it's a seat cover it matches so well. LOVE THIS PRODUCT. I needed to protect my seat because I feel like my denim jeans rub off the dark blue onto my light leather and it's hard to get it clean. It was easy to install, but I am a perfectionist and kept adjusting it. That was on me, not the product! GREAT PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: 2013 Honda Accord EX-L Coupe fits great.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice workmanship on this, as was my other one I bought. Fits seat good, attractive, blends in nice. These are very comfortable and cool in the summer time. No loose stitching or mess ups in the mfg of it. Stitching is all straight, strong too. Very well made. For the bucks... can't beat it. NO, I do not own the company either.
customer_reviews.author: walt

customer_reviews.title: Have Several Seats...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for a much loved (and much used) Volvo s40. It fits securely and doesn't move when I do. It actually looks like an original part of the car. The color is an excellent match, and the installation was a no-brainer. It even conducts heat from the factory heated seat. The only piece of advice I can offer is to take a minute and accurately measure your seat and double check the cover specs before you buy. In my case, it's a perfect fit. So far, no complaints. We'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fit to New Seat Cushion
customer_reviews.text: This car seat protector fit my 2019 Buick Envision perfectly. I could not get the strap to hook to anything under my seat in the front or go under the seat on both sides; however, I did slide the back straps with the anchor into the seat. The cushion stays in place without a lot of shifting, so I cut the front and side straps off since they were annoying me hanging there. No problem with the seat shifting and it is very comfortable. I purchased the cushion to protect my seat from the blue jean dye from staining my cream colored seats like it did to my last car.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Head

customer_reviews.title: Way too big, doesn't git BMW x1 as description says
customer_reviews.text: While these look and feel nice, they are huge...they do not fit the BMW x1, as the description says. I pushed them back into the chair as far as I could, but it still hands loose of the front. On the sides, there's nothing I can do to adjust, so it bulges on both sides. It's particularly bad on the right side where the loose/bulge interferes with the middle console and media buttons. It's too much of a hassle to return, so I'll donate to someone who has huge seats. Don't get for BMW x1 (or x3 probably).
customer_reviews.author: Carmen G.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Quality is on point
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because it did NOT fit my Dodge Dart, however it is VERY nice and high quality. I wish it fit!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Spruce Up Your Beater!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2007 Acura MDX with a tan leather interior. The leather on the driver and front passenger seats are dried and cracked so I took a chance on the above item. Winner, winner, chicken dinner! For my purposes (given its basically just a commuter vehicle), these covers really went a long way for making the interior a little more presentable. The match is very close to the original color and unless you really inspect it, you wouldn't notice its not the actual car seat. Solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kiko

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This cushion was a little better thanin that it did not grip your clothes quite as much. But it was still not slippery enough so that it was difficult to slide into a comfortable position. I think I need real leather. It also squeaked where it rubbed against the seat belt attachment. Also it just doesn't seem padded well. It seems harder sitting on the cushion then it does sitting on the original seat without the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Baker

customer_reviews.title: The knee pad is way too small
customer_reviews.text: It's good quality and I like the looks of it..it looks pretty in the car but the knee pad under the cushion is so short till it does no good for your legs and knees. it needs to come all the way across the seat of the car because everybody is not the same size that would only fit a child's knees there's no support because most people have larger legs than that and they don't sit with their knees on scrunched up together to try to get on that little pillow
customer_reviews.author: marian boggs

customer_reviews.title: Even the BMW dealership was impressed!
customer_reviews.text: These seat covers (I bought two for the front seats) arrived in great condition & in 10 minutes I had both of them installed. No weird "new smell" or any creases. It's almost impossible to discern that there are covers on the seats. When I took my new BMW X5 to the dealership, a BMW representative said that he'd honestly not seen better looking seat covers. The only drawback is that the vendor recommends not using the heated seat feature, otherwise these seat covers would have scored 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Y. C. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was very long
customer_reviews.text: It took almost a month to get. I should’ve paid more attention on the shipping info before ordering. I was so used to getting my items so fast from Amazon that I was a little careless. Overall it’s ok. It’s quite big for my 2019 BMW X5. I have light cream leather seats in my X5, I wear jeans a lot and didn’t want it to get color-transfer so I bought this. I didn’t go through the whole installing process. I just threw it on top of my car seat. It actually stayed in place really good. I got in and out without any problem. It’s comfortable and feels like leather.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy N.

customer_reviews.title: A little big for my 2017 Honda Civic sedan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect the cloth seat in my 2017 Civic. I usually wear blue jeans, and they were starting to discolor the seat. The seat cover is nice. It feels good, it stays put, and I think that it will last a long time. It was a snap to install. I hoped it would match the existing seat color better than it does, but it is OK. My biggest complaint is that the cover is about 1-1/2" too long to fit perfectly. I'm using it, but if you are picky about things like that you might not like it.
customer_reviews.author: Roger W. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! They bubble up a bit in the center aft first but start to flatten out over time. It just depends on how your seat is shaped. I have a 07 toyota prius. They have a bit of cushion as well and my prius seats are so hard! This was the perfect option and they look very professional. My seats are leather so I used an anti skit sheet used for floor rugs underneath it and it holds in place just fine. Otherwise it might slip around some.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Durable and hold up great!
customer_reviews.text: I order 2 gray front seat covers a few months back and I have to say, they’ve held up great in our Expedition. The kids have played them, we’ve gone through sports, rainy days, hot days, cold days...all sorts of weather conditions and these have held up great. We’re considering doing the same for our 2 benches in the back, the second & third rows. They took a while to get here but that’s literally the only problem we had, and that wasn’t really a problem. I would definitely order these again.
customer_reviews.author: AJeffrey

customer_reviews.title: The color match is great, the seat size is fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to cover a ripped seat in a 2003 Toyota Highlander. The color match is great, the seat size is fine, but the little straps that are supposed to secure it into place do nothing of the sort. It's like laying a rag on the chair and thinking 'hm, this should stay put when I slide in and out of my car multiple times a day!'. It's better than the rip in the seat that was there before, but my husband is super annoyed that he has to fiddle with the seat cover to get it to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to go over leather seats which the dog had scratched up. Installation was a bit of a brain teaser for about five minutes until I figured out the diagram's logic. So pleased with results in the first car, ordered two more for the second car. It does take a couple of weeks for them to arrive from China. Worth the wait. They look great, feel great, stay in place. Great product, just what was needed to solve a problem and prevent it from getting worse.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E. Goll

customer_reviews.title: Beware product may have faulty clip fasteners which will tear.
customer_reviews.text: The seat cover did its job of covering the original car seat. However after 2 months the side clip on the left has torn off on its own. It was secured as instructed but still tore from the base. It appears the material is old and not well sewn together. I've managed to still use it without the clip but cover is now shifting when exiting and entering vehicle. 2 stars for product but should have done better for overall quality for the price. Will report it to seller to see if they can correct the faulty product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great cover. Comfy padding. No "too" hot in summer
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful cover. Adds a bit of cushion and covers the tears in my existing seat in my 2004 Impreza perfectly. Also doesn't get as hot as the existing black leather. I do wish the front straps could be adjusted since they have a tendency to come lose under just elastic tension. The only anchor point on my seat doesn't apply enough tension to really secure the hooks into place. Not a big deal, just have to reposition the front hooks every few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Looks great...but wont stay on.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, however it doesn't fit my 2010 Hyundai Tucson perfectly...it fits when you put it on. However, when you get out of the car it comes with you, even though it's strapped on. The straps only help it not fall out of the seat but it does come lose and crooked so you have to fix it every time you get in or out of the car. I really like the way it looks and feels so I've been putting up with it, but it is definitely an inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amarilys17

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: These seat covers are so awesome! Truly, I should have ordered them years ago. My leather seats have seen better days and these seat covers are the perfect solution. In the future I will always invest in good seat covers. These things are quality, easy to install, and look good. The only thing is the fit isn't exactly perfect but it's not off enough to not really enjoy them. They are still great and I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Glaser

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the item itself seems fine.
customer_reviews.text: This item does not work well with a Chevy Cruze. It will attach on the front underside to the two screw hole locations, and does so well. However, it is constantly slipping and sliding out of place from the back. The two straps that slide between the top and bottom seat sections in the rear of the seat do not stay in place, so, each and every time I get out of the car, and go to get back in, I have to pull the seat cover back towards the rear of the seat, and straighten it out. This makes the item a nuisance. The quality of the item itself seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: An improvement over what's underneath
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good fit and have held up well. I have been honestly shocked. I don't care so much about the appearance so long as it's neat, just wanted to cover a tear as much for practicality as aesthetics. Most would say the appearance has improved, and they're easier to clean little coffee spills, etc. than the cloth.
customer_reviews.author: TNerf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Seat Cover
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this seat cover, and only wish I found it months ago. I have bought and returned so many horrible covers. I have 2006 Jeep Cherokee with a driver seat that was tearing so badly. I had duck taped it multiple time but the adhesive always got on my clothes. This is actually a formed seat cover that is so easy to install and doesn't move or shift. The quality is amazing. The fit is perfect. It is so comfortable. I could not be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tarron

customer_reviews.title: Actually a really great seat cover
customer_reviews.text: Actually a really great seat cover. Fits my Volvo XC60 perfectly. My only complaint is regarding the color options. I got the tan, and while it's close my Volvo leather interior is the lightest tan color and this doesn't quite match. There is no lighter option (think almost white/cream color). If that was available, this would be a perfect product. I do find that it gets a little hot during the summer, but it's very clean looking and a great option to cover just the bottom part of your seat. Mine is to protect from wear and tear but it would cover a lot up as well. Great seat cover!
customer_reviews.author: IMN81

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Color almost matches 2011 beige Kia Sorrento.
customer_reviews.text: Looks almost as good as original seat upholstery. Easy to install and stays in place. I bought this for the driver's seat of my beige 2011 Kia Sorrento. The door edge on the original was starting to wear out where I have to slide over a seam to get out. I hand stitched the seam to keep it together and added this sear cover. Perfect solution. Looks great too. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Look good
customer_reviews.text: I got these and was super excited for them! They looked great and seemed good quality. I put them on my seats and they fit nicely. Snug and pretty easy to install. I decided that I wanted full seat covers instead so I can't comment on how they held up, how they moved when in use, or how they feel. But 4 stars for what I got. The only reason for missing one star is because the color of the brand new seat covers was a bit 'bright' compared to the color of my leather seats, but I still recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nathanael Snelgrove

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but you have to wait.
customer_reviews.text: So the price was great, the product was as advertised, but it shipped from China so it took several weeks to arrive. The only other concerns was the color seemed a bit more yellow than I had expected and seat warmers are less effective as the covers insulate the heat from you. This second point is probably true with any seat cover, but is something to think about before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Roger A

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I installed these seat covers (one for passenger and one for driver). I've had difficulty finding good seat covers before so was worried these would not work. However, the thickness of the cover and fabric is very durable. Also the straps for the front and back really hold the cover tight on the seat. I also like how the cover fits of the the sides of the seat and doesn't slip around. So far we love these. I will definitely purchase again for other vehicles if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jalene Bowersmith

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Installation durability is questionable
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, almost an OEM look, for my 2019 Honda Passport. Definitely comfortable. My main grip is that the straps holding the seat covers in place are made of cheap elastic. Over time the straps wore out and the covers do not stay snug, especially with the sliding in and out of car. I will say that i am 340lbs and this plays a significant role in the short life of elastic. I am considering replacing them with nylon straps to see how that
customer_reviews.author: Robert R McCarthy III

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Wrong Fit
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time. Seat cover looks very good and well made. Look and feel of good quality leather. Had to return though because it's way too big for my BMW X3. Seller offered to send another (customized) seat cover. Decided against it as I didn't want to wait for another 3 weeks. If the seat cover fits your car, I recommend highly both the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: gadgetnut

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of these because at first it is hard to find seat covers that fit right. I was very pleased with the covers because they did not interfere with the armrest or power seat controls. Color is not exact match but pleasant. They have a good feel and seem durable. Easy to install and size just right.
customer_reviews.author: miketex1

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but one of the seat hooks broke 😢
customer_reviews.text: The look and feel of the seat is excellent. However, there are no directions. It is unclear whether the hooks attach to the seat itself or to each other. One of the hooks snapped trying to install it. Directions would’ve been helpful as to how to fasten the cover to the seat itself.
customer_reviews.author: sspring2

customer_reviews.title: Quality Seat Cover....Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Quality seat cover! Would highly recommend. Has look and feel of original Toyota Avalon Hybrid Limited leather seat. Fits the passenger front seat PERFECTLY!!! I would buy this replacement seat cover for my Toyota 4 Runner. I loved my passenger seat cover so much that I also bought one for the drivers seat! Just installed it and a PERFECT fit! Great product and great company service...quality all around.
customer_reviews.author: J. T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Appears to be high quality. Easy to install. I had a little trouble attaching the front hooks to underside of seat. Only because of the small and awkward space. It fits well and doesn't get in the way of seatbelts or seat controls. Stays in place when getting in and out. Note that it took 24 days to arrive. However, I wasn't in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: F Houston

customer_reviews.title: Color Not Quite Right But Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the gray for my Honda Odyssey. The shade of gray wasn't quite right, it looks more beige than the gray of my seats. When I contacted the company they didn't hesitate to give me a refund. Very pleased with that. And the quality of the seat covers seems excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S.

customer_reviews.title: Got another one for the passenger seat.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one for the driver seat and it turned out so good that I ordered one for the front passenger and back seats. Just takes FOREVER to arrive, coming from overseas, almost two months, that's my only complaint but it's worth the wait. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Eng

customer_reviews.title: Slides when you brake
customer_reviews.text: Cover does not fit a Lexus GX470 (large SUV) driver seat. There is about 2 inches of extra material left over in the front just under the knees when installed. The seat does not fit securely as the elastic parts stretch too much. There is no anti-slip material on the underside which means when you adjust yourself in seat, the cover moves around as well. You can really feel this when you do a hard brake and you slide forward. The look and design is nice, tho. The straps should not be elastic, and be able to tighten securely.
customer_reviews.author: Ven Om

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: We put these in the front seat of our Range Rover, a 2010 model. I had lower expectations for them to look great and fit great, but I was amazingly surprised.... They even have the venting for the air-conditioned seats.
customer_reviews.author: ELEN WS

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: This seat cover fit perfectly and looks like it came with the truck. A little challenging to put on due to newer vehicles having lack of space under seat due to motors and wiring. Time will tell how long the straps last before they lose there elastic but for now cover is tight and does not slide around. I would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: OK. Definitely not form fitting.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install. It puckers on the sides toward the front of the seat. Ideally, if the company had put two more anchors: one on each side of front edges of the cover so that it can hook under the edge of the seat then it would fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mindful Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great product, nice wraparound fit, perfect color match for Subaru Outback leather
customer_reviews.text: Great product, perfect fit and color match for 2018 Subaru Outback with Ivory leather seats. Purchased to contain added foam padding for the very firm Subaru seat bottoms. Works great and the wraparound design is nice to hold the extra padding in place and not get caught on your clothes as you get in and out of the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great seat cushion!
customer_reviews.text: Great seat cushion, like the front pocket and color is as described. Fits my drivers seat well and secure. Shipping was faster than expected. I may order another for the passenger seat if this one wears well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: Fits Volvo XC90
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to protect my light tan leather seats from my dark jeans. Fits my Volvo XC90 perfectly. Stays in place. Only issue is the color is a good bit darker than my leather so it’s noticeable but I don’t mind too much.
customer_reviews.author: BethanyisBetter

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for a low cost
customer_reviews.text: Car set was showing wear, cracks in the leather. I didn't need a full cover, just something for the seat. Not crazy about the solutions in retail stores. Didn't want just a cushion. Not crazy about leather repair. I could order an entire seat replacement but that's expensive for just a few wear tears on a seat. I ordered this because it was a low cost option and it is better than expected. Not an identical color match but the size is perfect, easy to fit on the seat and I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Good enough I guess?
customer_reviews.text: This mat is pretty hardy, but it isn't stain resistant and it wobbles around easily with my dog. I bought it because she started a large hole in the seat. There are hooks under the flap but they don't have anything to really hold onto. I would imagine this seat with wobble around a lot if a human sits on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Justen

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by the quality!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love it! It fits perfectly and I was very surprised with how comfortable it was when I sat down. I wasn’t expecting the added cushion, I only purchased to cover the cracking that had happened on the seat. You don’t slide off of this material either if that is something that you’re looking for. Color is a bit off, but I could tell that from the pictures. No big deal. I just hope it holds up well! Installed on a 2007 Lincoln MKZ drivers seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Strelsky

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought an old truck with torn seat bottoms. Bought two of these and back in business. Even matched the color of the original. I used the attached stretchy material and then added zip ties to easily connect to whatever I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Indy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: love this seat cover!
customer_reviews.text: This seat cover fits like a glove on my 2014 toyota camry seats. i ordered another one for the passenger seat and they look great! I had used a different brand seat cover and it kept coming lose over time and get in the way with seat belt buckle. It's been over a month and this seat cover stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kang

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am not an expertise in car accessories but I don't think you need to be an expert to tell that this is absolutely comfortable. It feels like a soft cushion. I bought two of them for my car and it was easy to attach and matched the beige color of my seats. The seat warmer and cooler are still able to function through it just fine and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Shopperatheart

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cushion to buy me some time before I have to get my seats redone. It's covering the cushion of a 1994 Ford Explorer and it ironically fits pretty well. It does an alright job of making the metal structure underneath less noticeable but over time, gravity wins that battle. It obviously wan't intended to supplement failing seat foam, but it does alright. Seems like it could stay in there for a while if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel J. Marano Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Calling China-NOT
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as advertised. It took a little time to install but so far working better than expected. Just so you know this is made in China. No local phone number if you have a problem. I hope that it holds up-time will tell. They do have an email address.
customer_reviews.author: MurftheSurf

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, appear high quality. Bought for my son's 2001 Honda Accord. The cover is too long so doesn't fit very well needing to be pulled back fairly often and my son says it is hot to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ann

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these seat covers. I have a 2004 Saturn Vue, and they were easy to install and fit nicely. They look good with the grey/silver interior and are easier to clean than the original fabric and leather (which had begun to split). I like having the extra front pocket. My heated seats still work with the covers on; with the extra layer, it just doesn't seem to get quite as warm, so I stick to the higher setting. Very glad I chose these.
customer_reviews.author: nogah5

customer_reviews.title: Finally! A seat cover that doesn't move!
customer_reviews.text: This seat cover looks like it's part of the factory seat. It is a matte finish and soft to the touch, but has no fibers for grossness to stick to. It actually looks like real leather, and does NOT slide around like every other seat cover I've bought. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jen_Poo

customer_reviews.title: Color was off
customer_reviews.text: Color didn't match all that well. My original gray has a little more blue in it other than that it has a decent fit. Easy to install. Dimensions are very good. Very happy with product and intend to buy another for the passenger seat as to match.
customer_reviews.author: GSG

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2017 Nissan Rogue SV
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well. The Rogue's seats are closed off on the back so the chucks do not display, but they are snuggly tucked inside and the adjustable strap is still going across the back. The factory seats are slippery lol I always felt like I was sliding forward in the car. This helps TREMENDOUSLY! Very satisfied with my purchase! Heated seat feature still works perfectly fine! Absolutely no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Bretagne

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I drive a 2017 Honda CR-V and this seat protector won’t stay connected to the seat. So frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Halla

customer_reviews.title: After 7 months of usage I would not recommend this..
customer_reviews.text: After 7 months of usage top layer started peeling off and would not recommend it...looks good initially but top layer will peel off eventually..i dont even use my car daily..only 4 days a week..
customer_reviews.author: Denish

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Fits really well in a 2012 Honda Pilot but the head rest cover didn’t fit but I’m fine with it not being there. I marked out the groceries I had on seat but you can see it looks like a good fit and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Catt Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best Car seat cover yet
customer_reviews.text: Best Car seat cover yet!! It's easy to put on, very stylish, stays in place does not slide when you get in & out of the car! I brought one for the driver's seat of my 2013 Buick Encore I swear this thing fits like it was custom made! I have already purchased another for my passenger seat. Worth the money... and protects your seats easier to purchase another seat cover then an entire new car seat! :) LOVE IT! Getcha one!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Greene

customer_reviews.title: Comfy relief from black leather seats
customer_reviews.text: Installed in 2015 Pathfinder. Hate black leather interior but bought car used so had to suck it up. Looked at several seat covers and these were the best choice based on price and ratings. They fit great and the beige seat covers actually look good with the black interior
customer_reviews.author: J. Lark

customer_reviews.title: Highly Satisfied with Cushions
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set of cushions for our 1991 Honda Civic one month ago. Fit perfectly and securely. Very comfortable. Easy installation. Your derriere slides effortlessly across the cushion as you enter and exit the vehicle. Wishing we had found these cushions years ago. Cushions are more comfortable than the original seat material. Thinking about acquiring a second set for our 2001 Honda Accord.
customer_reviews.author: Hoops Man

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly well made!
customer_reviews.text: My son's 2001 Avalon's leather driver side seat had split. I read the solid reviews for this product, which arrived today. It's really solidly constructed, and looks terrific--really a great value. I had purchased different covers for an old Honda years ago and they were as tacky as the split seats I was trying to cover. But this one immediately improved the appearance and comfort of my son's car. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sharnuski

customer_reviews.title: Seat cover
customer_reviews.text: I liked the material but unfortunately did not fit my car. It probably needs more straps to keep it in place. Every time I get in and out of the car I have put it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Bautista

customer_reviews.title: True to size, fit and quality.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the car seat cover is fantastic. The cover looks exactly like the picture and was so easy to install. Actually, I was pleasantly surprised at how nice they are. I would highly recommend them to anyone looking for car seat covers. I didn’t need a back piece & was happy to find just bottom covers that actually fit tight & snug. Looks like soft leather to me. I believe they are. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Good product but 3+ weeks for delivery
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful seat cover fits perfectly on my '06 Expedition. Material is thick and sturdy but little too slippy for my preference. Just got them so don't know how it will hold up, one star off for taking 25 days for delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Since 2003

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and better than expectation!
customer_reviews.text: Better than expectation! This simple car seat cushion looks absolutely elegant in real life. Make sure that the color blends in the car interior color. The material seem durable for a long lasting usage. I love the add-on front love pocket close to your feet for stuff storage. Make sure it fits the seat size.
customer_reviews.author: Chuong Le

customer_reviews.title: Value-Priced, Quality Car Seat Cover
customer_reviews.text: The seat cover is made of quality, durable material and extremely easy to install. As you can see from my pic, the seat cover is a perfect fit with a great color match for my 2013 BMW X3. Very pleased with the product!
customer_reviews.author: BeachGuy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit on Dodge Journey.  Very impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed! Fit my 2017 Dodge Journey perfectly. Can hardly tell it is a cover. I went with the Ultra-luxury version and it paid off. Fabric with thick padding has a memory foam feel. I purchased these to protect my leather seat bottoms, and they look and feel great. Only negative is they ship from China so it took a month to arrive. But it is worth it, if you can wait.
customer_reviews.author: Stan M.

customer_reviews.title: It’s only a thin cover
customer_reviews.text: did not help for my bucket seat for my car. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Nitz Fitz

customer_reviews.title: We tried these and they look and feel like the original seats
customer_reviews.text: The leather seats in our Acura RDX had a few rips. We got quoted $600-$1,000 to fix/reupholster the leather. We tried these and they look and feel like the original seats. So good we're not even considering reupholstering the leather. We've only had them for a few weeks, so we can't speak to their lasting quality yet. But if they do last even a year, we would be very happy and would surely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Lee

customer_reviews.title: Fits okay but just not snug enough
customer_reviews.text: So far unimpressed. I used this on my Mercedes GL450 to protect the light colored seats from the dye on my jeans. The seat fits okay but slides off every time I get out of he vehicle. Followed the instructions really well. Looking to adjust once again and update the review if things improve.
customer_reviews.author: Rick A.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased item to cover drivers seat of 2008 Mercedes C300 until I can get the seat leather repaired. It took 10 minutes to install, matches the color and design almost perfectly. I hate seat cover sets, this is the best option for worn or faded leather seats. Going to order 2nd one to protect passenger seat.
customer_reviews.author: André

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this Seller and the product! I bought beige color fist and found out the size was slightly larger than my car seat and color didn't match. [My car is 2008 ACURA TL. My seat color is between beige and gray.] I contacted the Seller and they asked for my car seat dimensions and made a customized seat cover for me for free! See attached photos. [The wrinkles were gone on the second day.] The touch feeling of the seat cover is very good and comfortable. Still can adjust seats. Haven't tried seat heater yet. Great customer service! Respond quickly and care your feedback and solve your concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Chen, Ting-I

customer_reviews.title: You will not be sorry .....
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed and securely fits the seat. Very pleased with the quality and the price. Seller was also receptive to constructing 2 larger / custom pads for my full size pickup. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: coloradonana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and good value
customer_reviews.text: These are well worth the brief wait for shipping. Gorgeous and soft to the touch. Beautiful uniform color. Drivers side slides just a little bit getting in and out so I just added a reinforced extra clip to hold it a little more taught and voila! Beautiful good calue!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design for my Passat.
customer_reviews.text: Cuts off the circulation in my legs because of the badly designed thigh support. Installation design in terrible. They're asking me to pay for shipping to return it. STAY AWAY!!!! Cheap looking.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Well built and good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of these seat covers and they are of excellent quality and fit. These fit my 2013 Fusion perfect and the color matches the interior very well. highly recommend but do expect slow shipping with these.
customer_reviews.author: wsh

customer_reviews.title: I love these in my car
customer_reviews.text: I love these in my car. I purchased a full set, the two front seat mats and this one for the back seat. I own a 2011 chevy traverse. The seat mats help to keep my twins from ruining the car. And they fit great!
customer_reviews.author: Shia Morris

customer_reviews.title: Seat cover
customer_reviews.text: was delivered quickly, great quality! Easy to install Fits great. Just ordered another one for my passenger seat. I have a 2016 Honda CRV with tan seats, leery putting full seat covers on because of the side airbags. These seats will work beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Kenna W. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Its like having a new seat!
customer_reviews.text: Really love this seat cover. Its like having a new seat. Soft, structured, supportive, beautiful workmanship, great material. I highly recommend this car seat cover. I will be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn quiroga

customer_reviews.title: Very surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised that it was high quality and fit perfect for my 2017 Denali. Very easy to install in just a few minutes. Match to original black leather seats is perfect & nearly indistinguishable from the cushion itself!! Very surprised ........jury still out on how long it lasts but at the price of $21 it is a throwaway! Saves wear on original seat covers!!!
customer_reviews.author: Derrickhand

customer_reviews.title: Look Great!
customer_reviews.text: These seats are for my 2012 Mercedes Benz GLK. They look great nd were easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Bird

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Great. Just as described. I do not use the head rest piece, too "matchy, matchy" for me. Does the job of protecting the seats. My car, to my surprise, does not have open access to the back of the seat where the seat and back of the seat meet. But I was still able to make the secure circle tabs work. Would like to see it in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Bleau

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The black matched the leather seats perfect. Installed easily feels good sitting in it. Only drawback when you get out it slides badly. Might be it's in a Jeep little higher then a car causing pressure on it getting out. Not a big deal now little annoying at 1st
customer_reviews.author: straightshot

customer_reviews.title: great cover - fit 2 different type of vehicles
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Ultra-luxury PU leather Car Seat cushion car seat cover for my 2003 Toyota Highlander and it fits perfectly. very nice seat cover, looks good and it feels great. bought a pair for my Lexus ct200h too. two different cars but the seat cushion fit both.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P

customer_reviews.title: Installed easily. After installation my husband commented that he couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Added comfort for hot, sticky, days. Installed easily. After installation my husband commented that he couldn't even tell there was a seat cover on! Fit perfectly in my Ford Edge.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: It’s not a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit snug or stay in place on my 2008 Benz C300 driver seat.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Great Item Worth the Money and More!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. First I'd like to say that I received the items several weeks before schedule....which was nice. But, mostly I want to say these were worth the money and more. They were easy to install.....even with my arthritic hands.....and fit beautifully. My 10 year old car seats look new and fresh again. If you need something like this just go ahead and order. You will be happy as could be with them. I certainly am.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works better
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my pale gray leather car seats! I purchased a new vehicle and soon noticed that my jeans were beginning to stain the leather. I needed something that would cover the seat, not be too obvious, and that would allow the heated seats to work. This fits the bill perfectly. It stays in place pretty well, the color matches, it covers the entire seat, and is breathable. Just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: CC Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great and it is comfy and easy to install. I liked it so much that I went back and bought me the entire covers of my car. It matches my sits color that you can not tell the difference. I have a feeling that the product will last for a very long time. It is worth buying it, trust me.
customer_reviews.author: So Crazy Christian

product_meta.title: EDEALYN Ultra-Luxury PU Leather Car seat Protection Cover Car seat Cover for Most Four-Door Sedan&SUV,Single seat Cover Without backrest 1pcs (W 20.8× D 21× T 0.35inch) (3D-Beige)
feature_bullets: It fits the seat of most midsize and compact vehicles. Most likely it doesn't fit the seat of Truck, super size sedan ,super size SUV
This seat cover protects your seat, it protects against seat wearing, indentations, scratches.
Small Pocket with individuation ,Easily and fast get your stuff from front pocket, such as mobile phone and wallet etc.
Size: W 20.5 '' ×D 21 ''((Note: measuring your car seat size to ensure it is fit, thank you!)),
Material: PU leather , Quantity: 1 Seat cover; Thickness: 0.35 inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,211 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
